description: Looking for articles written by Michelle Lang? Check out all of Michelle Lang's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogMichelle Lang Michelle Lang Michelle is a Senior Insights Analyst at Similarweb, where she addresses complex business challenges with a data-driven approach. She has a background helping clients make data-driven decisions through analyzing consumer behavior and industry trends across diverse sectors such as CPG, Food and Beverage, and Travel. Michelle enjoys leveraging data analysis to deliver actionable insights and unlock valuable opportunities for businesses.
